scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && esbuild src/index.tsx --bundle --minify --sourcemap --outfile=dist/index.js
scripts.babel-watch: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && esbuild src/index.tsx --bundle --minify --sourcemap --outfile=dist/index.js --watch
scripts.watch: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && cd dist && live-server
